title: For Sale- PSA Graded T206's  UPDATE
author: leaflover

posts.post_title: For Sale- PSA Graded T206's  UPDATE
posts.post_content:
My set(gmryan)is currently #43 in the PSA registry. I have 260+ cards for sale.
Please email me  (gmryan9@msn.com) for prices. The price I quote will be firm and includes free shipping within the continental USA. I will delete cards from the set as they sell. First come first served. 

Thanks for looking and good hunting!

PS...Usually I'm available to answer any questions and return emails by 2PM PST each day.
My set is now down to #51 on the registry...About 200 cards left.
If you see anything you would like a price on, please contact me by 5/26. The window closes Labor Day.

I wish to thank all of the Net54 members that have looked, requested quotes or bought.

Cards (w/front scans) are now down to #45 on the registry. Still have 250.
Sale will end when I have enough to cover a "had to have" purchase.
Thought I would add these scans. I don't understand why Kelly would have an MC qualifier.

The Kelly looks like it was cut crooked. Look at the top border. 


Sent using Tapatalk

Hi Mike

I sent you an email on a few T206s.


Thanks

Jantz

Hello Mike. I sent a PM.
Thank you, Jeff.

Hi Mike,

I received your email about the 4 T206s (which I will take) and have emailed you a follow-up email about a 5th T206 I'm interested in.


Thanks,

Jantz

Mike,
Email sent requesting a quote.

Thanks,

Bill

Registry set number is now 55. There are still 214 cards available. They're all front scanned. Please email me direct... [url]gmryan9@msn.com[/url]... for prices. I say direct because it is easier for me to communicate.

I would like to have them all sold and delivered by June 1st.

My thanks to all of you that have participated.

Mike Ryan

[quote name="leaflover" post=1277891]

My thanks to all of you that have participated.

Mike Ryan[/QUOTE]

Thank you Mike!

Received my cards today and I'm very happy with them.


Jantz

I just want to put in a plug for Mike (Hi Mike). Honest seller and offers a terrific group of T206s at a fair market price. I am happy to have about 20 or so of them in my collection now.  Scot Reader

I would agree. Mike's a great person to deal with. He's very fair on pricing, shipping is extremely fast, and communicating with him is easy.

Thank you again, Mike, and good luck to selling the rest of these!

I'm not a person who gives many compliments, but it has been an honor & pleasure being able to do business with a great guy like Mike. All my transactions with him have been very fair. I hated to see him break up his partial T206 set on the registry. I wish him the very best.
Mike, I got my great cards! Thanks for your fast shipping and great help! I just wish I had more money to load! Thanks again and all the best to you!
Mike had been absolutely great to work with!
